event_name: Monsters & Ghouls Kiki Ball
description: Calling all monsters and creatures of the night!! Bring the scares and the looks to celebrate Halloween with a Kiki Ball. From classical gothic films to modern classics, get ready for a night of terrifying and cunty looks. üëª Walkers: $5 üíÄ Spectators: $20 üéÉ Tables: $125 üéß DJ: Kachonda Jeremy Scott üé§MCs: Gago Siriano & Pegasus Pinklady üí∏ VKBA is welcoming donations from sponsors to support the ball. Reach out via email at info@vkba.ca or dm us on instagram. üì≤ If you are unable to pay for tickets but would like to attend the ball, please email infovkba@gmail.com, no one is refused entry for lack of funds. Please contact us by noon of October 30th, 2025. ‚ùîAny questions feel free to DM us or email infovkba@gmail.com üëΩ Co-produced by: Mother Bee Gvasalia & Kachonda Jeremy Scott
location: The Dance Centre, 677 Davie St, Vancouver, BC, CA

event_name: What‚Äôs Up Wednesday - 2026 New Year‚Äôs Eve
dance_style: Afro-Caribbean, Afrobeats, Soca, Dancehall, Zouk, Kompa, Kizomba
description: Goodbye 2025, hello 2026: What's Up Wednesday NYE at The Loft. 90s/00s R&B/Hip-Hop, Afro-Caribbean, sweet-savory bites + midnight toast. üéâ Welcome to What‚Äôs Up Wednesday - 2026 New Year‚Äôs Eve Edition üéâ On December 31 , celebrate five hours of sparkle, sound, and connection at The Loft by Earls (Yaletown) as we count down the final minutes of 2025 and welcome 2026 . Roaming premium bars, party favors, and a live countdown with a Champagne or zero-proof toast at midnight.
location: The Loft by Earls, 1095 Mainland, Vancouver, BC V6B 6G9, CA

event_name: Big Head Halloween Ft: Mr Moe, Natty, Matt Rose, J-Feud, Thom Banks
description: Halloween House Joust featuring Natty, Mr. Moe, Thom Banks, Matt Rose, and special guest J-Feud. Ages 19+, in person event with refunds up to 7 days before the event.

event_name: NEWSIES
description: Get ready to be swept away by the electrifying energy and inspiring story of the NEWSIES musical! Welcome to the NEWSIES event happening at the Dave Dunnet Community Theatre! Get ready for a weekend of thrilling performances from November 20th-23rd at 7:00 PM (Pacific Time) and two 1:00 PM Matinees. Join us for an unforgettable experience filled with music, dance, and excitement. Don't miss out on this opportunity to be entertained by talented artists showcasing their skills on stage. Mark your calendars and come enjoy a night of entertainment with us! It's time to carry the banner on your stage with Disney's Newsies! Set in turn-of-the century New York City, Newsies is the rousing tale of Jack Kelly, a charismatic newsboy and leader of a band of teenaged 'newsies.' When titans of publishing raise distribution prices at the newsboys‚Äô expense, Jack rallies newsies from across the city to strike against the unfair conditions and fight for what's right! Based on the 1992 motion picture and inspired by a true story, Newsies features a Tony Award-winning score by Alan Menken ( Little Shop of Horrors , Sister Act ) and Jack Feldman and a book by Tony Award winner Harvey Fierstein ( Kinky Boots ). Featuring the now classic songs ‚ÄúCarrying the Banner,‚Äù ‚ÄúSeize the Day,‚Äù and ‚ÄúSanta Fe,‚Äù Newsies is packed with non-stop thrills and a timeless message, perfect for the whole family and every audience.
location: 2009 Cadboro Bay RD, VICTORIA, BC V8R5G4, CA
source: West Coast Triple Threat Performing Arts Society

event_name: Yoga for dancers (and not only)
description: Designed by and for dancers, this class helps you recover faster, prevent injuries, and refine your lines so you can express yourself freely. Step onto the mat and unlock the fluidity, strength, and grace your movement deserves. In Yoga for Dancers, you‚Äôll explore targeted sequences that stretch tight hips, open your chest, and awaken the stabilizing muscles that support every leap, turn, and extension.

event_name: Roots & Rhythm Dance - CISCLES
description: Roots & Rhythm Dance is a fun conscious dance & sound healing meditation rooted in community. Join us for a night of deep connection, movement, and sound with DJ Ciscles, followed by a sound bath meditation.

event_name: Salsalloween
description: Get ready for the ultimate Salsalloween fiesta!  'Caliente Halloween' is taking over Mangos , the biggest Salsa Welcome to Salsalloween! Come join us for a spooktacular night of salsa dancing at . Put on your best costume and dance the night away to Latin beats under the stars. Get ready for a night filled with fun , music , and dancing with fellow salsa enthusiasts. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, this event is perfect for everyone. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to celebrate Halloween in style with a twist of Latin flair . Grab your friends and get ready for a memorable night at Salsalloween!

event_name: Dia de Los Muertos Latin Party
description: Join us for a night full of color, music, and tradition as we celebrate D√≠a de los Muertos at The Queen‚Äôs in Nanaimo! Music by DJ Moses ‚ÄúEl Pachanguero‚Äù. Dance the night away with the best Salsa, Reggaeton, and Top Latin Hits! Catrina Contest! Show off your best Catrina costume and win $100 cash prize! Let‚Äôs make this a night to remember with music, dance, and tradition!

event_name: Date Night- Salsa Edition
description: Beginner salsa lesson, no partner required! Join us for our special Date Night- Salsa Edition event! This beginner lesson will be taught by Leilani, our salsa specialist. And there's no experience needed! Sign up on your own and be paired in class, or bring a partner with you and save some $$! However you show up, you're sure to leave with some extra pep in your step- this high-energy Latin style guarantees it! Single tickets = $20 + fees Couples tickets = $35 + fees Address: 3223 Fraser Street, Vancouver, BC Read more Category: Arts, Dance Good to know Highlights 1 hour ages 16+ In person Free parking Doors at 6:30 PM Refund Policy No refunds
price: $20 + fees for single tickets, $35 + fees for couples tickets

event_name: Halloween in Havana
description: Forget the cold and step into a night of tropical terror! This Friday, October 31st, Mangos Kitchen Bar is throwing the hottest Halloween in Havana party in the city! Get ready for an unforgettable night where the Cuban heat meets the spooky fright.

event_name: Nelda Swiggett Quintet - 'For the Birds'
description: Live music, images and poetry invite reflection on our changing climate. Come at 6pm to learn about local clean energy opportunities.

event_name: Feeling, Seeing, and Adjusting | Peek Fest 2025
description: Explore feeling and memory through directed movements. The workshop uses directed improvisations to explore feeling and memory. Solo work considers embodiment‚Äîhow we reach, fall, and play with gravity. With partners, we practice seeing and being seen, shaping choices as we compose from desire. We'll listen softly and loudly, tell stories, do nothing, and assemble from found things.

event_name: BRAVE - a 5Rhythms¬Æ Dance Immersion with Anne Marie Hogya + Bettina Rothe
description: In this 5Rhythms¬Æ Waves and Heartbeat weekend dance | movement workshop we will explore the physical and emotional terrain of our brave. Embodiment practices, a wooden sword ritual, as well as opportunities for speaking up will be part of this empowering weekend.
price: $365 / $325 early bird if paid by October 10th
location: 5575 West Saanich, VICTORIA, BC V9E 2G1, CA

event_name: LATIN HALLOWEEN BOAT PARTY VANCOUVER 2025
description: Vancouver‚Äôs ONLY Latin Halloween Boat Party! 3 levels, 2 dance floors, 3-hour cruise, live DJs, bar & 375+ guests!

event_name: Non-Stop Disco Party
description: Join us for an evening of vintage dance music as we put four to the floor in tribute to disco glamour from the 70s-00s. Featuring all the retro glitz and drag whimsy one might have seen in all the discotheques from the dawn of mainstream queer culture and late-night hedonism.

event_name: HAVANA FRIDAYS
description: Havana Fridays is a salsa dancing event with a good mix of Latin Music. Free Latin combo dance classes. 4 Types of Tickets Option 1 (Dinner & Dancing (Groups 10 or more People) 6pm-9pm Our $54 Per Person Dinner (Tropical Fix Menu) includes it all and is perfect for a fun date night, or large birthday, anniversary parties, stagettes or any celebration of life. Includes cover charge for the dancing, Dj and dance lesson ,2 course meal from our Tropical Fix menu. Round of Mangos plane shooters for your guests. 3hours per Reservation. After your group can stay for the party. (Note)After dinner  if you want to keep your table (6) for the night just order a bottle for each party of 6. (Example if your group is 10 people you can keep 2 tables and order 2 bottles or you can keep one table and order 1 bottle) $54 plus tax and gratuities per person. Option 2 ( Dinner & Dancing up to 9 People ) 6pm-9pm You can choose from Our Open Menu. Minimum spending is $54 per person Includes cover charge for the dancing, Dj and dance lesson. Courtesy Round of Mangos plane/boat  shooters for your guests when your table reach the Minimum spending. (EÔªøxample  Table of 6 minimum will be $54 multiply by the number of guests) OÔªøption 3 Table Service After 10pm This include VIP entrance and a choice of our bottle service packages $300-600 plus tax and tips. Note : each table is for 6 for each extra person will be extra charge. Example : Your Group is 10 people Choice 1 Table for 10 people will be 2 bottles minimum  ($600)and 2 tables,  No cover Choice 2 one table(6) ($300 minimum)  and 4 covers charge $20 each Option 4 (Dancing Only Tickets) After 9pm Want to dance the night away but don't need a seat? General Admission or Line By-Pass Tickets are available here or at door. These general admission/dancing-only tickets do not include food or seating but do include the 9pm dance lesson!.

event_name: Dia de los Muertos at Mangos
description: DAY OF THE DEAD - Celebrating Life at Mangos! Join us for an authentic and vibrant D√≠a de Muertos celebration at Mangos Kitchen Bar. We honor our loved ones with joy, music, and color. Dance to the best Latin rhythms all night long and enjoy tropical drink specials.

event_name: 911 Salsa Tuesdays
description: DJ Cachete. Complementary Salsa Classes by Diego from 8:30pm to 9:30pm and after the party begins. Dance Salsa, Bachata, Merengue the Whole Night.

event_name: Bloom ft: DJ Suar3z, Skyla J, Oz, K≈´maimi, Andrew Allsgood
description: Amapiano, Latin, Afrobeat, Dancehall, Afro House and Funk ‚Äîsounds born from roots, crafted for movement. Come BLOOM with us.

event_name: Sounds of the City: Live Music Showcase
description: A live music series celebrating Vancouver‚Äôs diverse musical talent. Featuring Robyn Froese and Etchos.

event_name: Halloween Bash: Music Festival at Mount Doug!
description: Get ready for the ultimate Halloween Bash at Mount Doug with a music festival featuring incredible bands, spooky vibes!

event_name: Midnight Magic ‚Ä¢ New Year‚Äôs Eve with Rock of Ages
description: Ring in 2026 with dinner, dancing, Rock of Ages live, DJ sets, photo booth & buffet. Adults-only NYE bash you won‚Äôt forget!
source: Four Points by Sheraton Victoria Gateway

event_name: THE BEATLES CHRISTMAS DANCE PARTY! - WITH THE SUTCLIFFES
description: Get ready for a magical night of holiday cheer and Beatles hits as The Sutcliffes bring the Fab Four‚Äôs energy to Sooke for a festive dance party.

event_name: GAZEBO PARTY! w/ the Kasperl Quintet, Mariachi Sin Frontera, and Figrin Sam
description: Chill garden vibes, live tunes by Kasperl Quintet, Mariachi Sin Frontera & Figrin Sam, plus cozy soup & bread - don‚Äôt miss out! Tickets will be sold on a sliding scale ($5/$10/$15)! Pay here or doors. Ticket sales go towards the bands.
location: 5575 West Saanich, VICTORIA, BC V9E 2G1, CA

event_name: Line Dancing at the Red Barn
description: After a day of fresh produce and local delights at our final Farmers Market of the 2025 season, keep the energy going with an evening of line dancing at the Red Barn! Dust off your cowboy boots, grab your friends, and head on over for a night filled with fun, music, and dancing. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a complete beginner, our friendly instructors will get you moving in no time. Bring your appetite, or work one up on the dance floor, because Yo Bones BBQ truck will be there too! Cash or card accepted at the bar serving select wines, beers and cocktails. Don‚Äôt miss out on this lively community event ‚Äì it's the perfect way to end your market day!
source: Southlands Grange Centre for Farming and Food

event_name: Halloween Dance Fundraiser
description: Come join us for a spooktacular night of dancing, costumes, and music! The Kinette Club of Lake Cowichan is excited to host the 4th Annual Halloween Dance Fundraiser in support of Cowichan Lake Community Services. With live music from The Peachy Sundays, this is an event you won't want to miss!
location: 309 South Shore, LAKE COWICHAN, BC V0R 2G0, CA

event_name: Sacred Circle Dance with Chrisandra Harris
description: An enchanted evening of Sacred Circle Dancing led by Chrisandra Harris. Includes a review of common steps and the Enchanted Isle Dance Workshop. Early bird prices until September 2, 2025. Street parking available. Bring or buy your own lunch and/or dinner. Coffee and tea provided. A Sunday Session will be organized if there is enough interest.

event_name: SEMI PRIVATE SWING DANCE MINI SERIES
description: Mini series of 4 weekly classes right before Christmas. Led by expert instructor Kat Single-Dain, covering charleston, lindy hop, and vernacular jazz. Perfect for beginners and those with some experience.

event_name: Haunted Hollywood - Halloween Show and Party
description: A Halloween-themed dance show and party featuring various dance styles, DJs, photo ops, games, and a costume contest. The event includes a dance show from 7:00 PM to 8:00 PM, followed by a party. Ticket prices vary based on seating and purchase date.

event_name: CAPITALWAVE SHOWCASE 3
description: An evening of raw emerging talents and sounds ranging from all corners of the urban genre! Experience Live Hip-Hop, Trap, Afrobeats, RnB & Latin.

event_name: Houseworx - Rennie Foster Christoph Maitland Formidable Throwdown
description: Houseworx brings you a spooktacular night of House Music featuring Rennie Foster with support from Christoph Maitland & Formidable Throwdown. 3 very impressive Halloween Decorations installations will be in full effect, transforming Lucky into a haunted playground.

event_name: Barnstormer! Gatsby Glitz 'n Swingin' Hits ‚Äî Live at the Odd Fellows Hall
description: A swing night with Gatsby flair featuring live music, dance instruction, and charitable donations supporting the Odd Fellows Benevolence.
location: Fox Cabaret, 2321 Main, Vancouver, BC V5T, CA

event_name: CASINO after dark : Halloween Party & Play
description: A Halloween bash filled with spooky surprises and thrilling games! 6 hours ages 19+ In person Doors at 9:00 PM Refund Policy No refunds
location: 3033 King George, SURREY, BC V4P 1B8, CA

event_name: Wes Please @ LevelTwo presented by Beat Freqs
description: The summer may be over, but we‚Äôre bringing the festival vibes back to Nanaimo this December with the one and only Wes Please! Supported by legendary light and visual artists Wax Candy, this party is going to be a vibe that you won‚Äôt want to miss!

event_name: Endless Waves ~ weekly 5Rhythms in Victoria, BC ~ OCTOBER 2025
description: 5Rhythms classes with Joanne Winstanley. Register for all 4 October classes: $84 Register for just one class: $23 NEW ~ dancers under 30 years old: 2 for $25 (bring a friend for free) If space permits, drop-in at the door: $25

event_name: Endless Waves ~ weekly 5Rhythms in Victoria, BC ~ OCTOBER 2025
description: 5Rhythms classes with Shauna Devlin. Register for all 4 October classes: $84 Register for just one class: $23 NEW ~ dancers under 30 years old: 2 for $25 (bring a friend for free) If space permits, drop-in at the door: $25

event_name: The Fabulous B-Sides
description: An exciting six piece show band that are highly energetic and unique! Featuring a fabulous variety of Soul, Funk, Pop and Classic Rock!

event_name: Queer All Hallows Dance Party
description: DJs, Drag Show and Dancing, oh my! Put on your costumes and join us for a macabre night of drag and dance. Local drag stars Billie Boy Toy-Ton and Sheila V Toff start off the night followed by Vancouver groovers, DJ Krista Mac and DJ Bella Sie, with some good vibes on the dance floor. Celebrate this All Hallows with local brews, a low-stim room, a big dance hall, a costume contest and some yummy treats (or tricks?). Let's get ready for winter with all our girls, gays and theys - this dance floor does not discriminate! It'll be an evening of music, performance, laughter and connection Sponsored by Kroffat Brake & Wheel.

event_name: Dance Weavers ~ Conscious Dance Facilitator Training
description: Join us for an in person immersion training on Salt Spring Island to gain confidence to learn to guide dances for your community!
location: 195 Byron RD, SALT SPRING ISLAND, BC V8K1C8, CA

event_name: Monsters and Villains Student Showcase
description: Join Canned Heat students as they delve into the world of monsters and villains. A spooky and sexy dance show to celebrate Halloween! 1 hour 30 minutes, ages 18+, in person, free parking, doors at 6:45 PM. Refunds up to 7 days before event.

event_name: SINNERGY UNLEASHED
description: Join us for an evening of sexy, sinful indulgences to gorge yourself on, including burlesque and cabaret! SINnergy Productions presents: SINNERGY UNLEASHED at the Passion & Performance Dance Studio Saturday, November 15th 2025 | 19+ | ID Required Doors: 6PM | Show: 7PM They say Hell has seven layers, come dance along the scorched cobblestone path with us. Join us for a downright sinful evening of burlesque, drag and other performing arts. It's going to be HOT, DIRTY, and SEXY with all our performers bringing their own personal flavor of hellfire.

event_name: Shade: Post Festival Party
description: Join us for a night of burlesque and drag hosted by Sylvester Stalletto at Friends of Dorothy! We are celebrating the successful run of Shade's inaugural International Burlesque Festival! Get ready to dance, mingle, and enjoy great food, cocktails, mocktails and entertainment.

event_name: Party Time
description: Join us for Party Time - a night filled with fun, music, and laughter! Get ready to dance the night away with great beats and awesome company. This event is all about letting loose and having a good time with friends and new acquaintances. Come as you are and enjoy the party vibes! Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to create unforgettable memories.

event_name: New Year's Eve Dinner & Dance with The Sutcliffes
description: Join us for a night of great music, delicious food, and dancing at the Upstairs Lounge, Oak Bay Recreation Centre. Get ready to groove to the soulful tunes of The Sutcliffes and enjoy a fantastic dinner with friends and family. Let's ring in the New Year together in style! Doors open at 6:00 pm, dinner at 7:30 pm, and dancing from 9:00 pm to 12:30 am. Menu includes carved roast beef, wild mushroom linguine, salads, and assorted desserts. Champagne at midnight plus party favours!
location: Oak Bay Recreation - Personal Training/Active Rehab, 1975 Bee, Victoria, BC, CA

event_name: Halloween 'Costume Dance Party' with prizes!
description: Back by popular demand, Take Cover will be back to deliver super fun, recognizable dance tunes! $10 door. Some great food here, too! FREE PARKING.

event_name: Free Salsa and Bachata Dance Lessons!
description: Ready to get your hips moving, feet stomping, and heart pumping to the rollicking rhythms of la m√∫sica latina? Whether you're a complete newbie or just looking to sharpen your skills, our fun and friendly classes will have you grooving in no time. Our absolute beginners class is absolutely free! Feel the energy, embrace the music, and unleash the dancer within! No partner? No problem‚Äîyou‚Äôll meet new friends while learning new moves.Two left feet? Don‚Äôt worry! We‚Äôll have you grooving with confidence before you know it, and wondering why you didn‚Äôt start sooner.
